title: Comparison of the use of a spiral nasojejunal tube and transendoscopic enteral tubing in washed microbiota transplantation via the mid-gut route
content:
Publication date: Available online 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Ya-Mei Zheng, Hui-Yi Wu, Meng-Meng Ye, Jie-Yi Cai, Yu Yuan, Wen-Rui Xie, Jia-Ting Xu, Tao Liu, Xing-Xiang He, Li-Hao Wu
